channel.title: Design on hmuy's yapping corner
channel.description: Recent content in Design on hmuy's yapping corner

item.title: Google's Material You, three years later.
item.description: introduction okay my ahh capped I haven’t been using Material You for that long lmao. This is just my thoughts on what is in my opinion, the biggest change to Android since their own switch to Material Design back in 2014. Although, I believe this is much more than just a design language, it’s about the evolution of one of our most important devices today - the smartphone. backstory To me, a phone that I can’t customize to look, feel and function to my liking is not a phone I’d enjoy using for more than a couple of hours, let along every single day.
